grattantheme 0.8.3.3.900
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Using grattantheme
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

chart_types_ext

Grattan chart types

create_fullslide()

Assemble a chart featuring the Grattan logo and orange line

export_latex_code()

Export the figure environment LaTeX code for a ggplot2 graph object.

extract_labs()

Take a ggplot2 object and return a list containing its title, subtitle, and caption. Recognises Patchwork plots.

grattan_anim_save()

Save gganimate animation with Grattan visual styling

grattan_animate()

See ?gganimate::animate. This function is a replica of gganimate::animate, except for the addition of a 'type' argument that allows the creation of Grattan-styled charts.

grattan_y_continuous() scale_y_continuous_grattan() grattan_x_continuous() scale_x_continuous_grattan()

Ensure your y- and x-axis are Grattan style guide-consistent and doesn't hang off the edge of the chart.

grattan_darkorange

Hex code for the colour: Grattan dark orange (carrot soup)

grattan_darkorange_f

Hex code for the faded colour: Grattan dark orange (faded)

grattan_darkred

Hex code for the colour: Grattan dark red (kidney bean soup)

grattan_darkred_f

Hex code for the faded colour: Grattan dark red (faded)

grattan_grey1

Hex code for the colour: Grattan grey 1 (truffle soup)

grattan_grey2

Hex code for the colour: Grattan grey 2 (cream of mushroom soup)

grattan_grey3

Hex code for the colour: Grattan grey 3 (morel mushroom soup)

grattan_grey4

Hex code for the colour: Grattan grey 4 (shiitake mushroom soup)

grattan_grey5

Hex code for the colour: Grattan grey 5 (blackbean soup)

grattan_grey_alpha

Hex code for the colour: Grattan 'forecast shading' grey

grattan_grey_title

Hex code for the colour: Grattan title grey

grattan_gridlinegrey

Hex code for the grey used for gridlines in Grattan charts

grattan_label() grattan_label_repel()

Create labels in the Grattan style - no border, minimal padding

grattan_lightorange

Hex code for the colour: Grattan light orange (sweet potato soup)

grattan_lightorange_f

Hex code for the faded colour: Grattan light orange (faded)

grattan_lightyellow

Hex code for the colour: Grattan light yello (corn chowder)

grattan_lightyellow_f

Hex code for the faded colour: Grattan light yellow (faded)

grattan_orange

Hex code for the colour: Grattan light orange (sweet potato soup)

grattan_orange_alpha

Hex code for the colour used for Grattan box backgrounds (orange alpha)

grattan_orange_f

Hex code for the faded colour: Grattan light orange (faded)

grattan_pal()

Create a Grattan-appropriate palette for your chart.

grattan_palette_set

A list of Grattan colour sets

grattan_point_filled()

Convenience function to create large points with white centres

grattan_red

Hex code for the colour: Grattan red (tomato soup)

grattan_red_f

Hex code for the faded colour: Grattan red (faded)

grattan_save() grattan_save_all()

Save plots in Grattan-approved sizes and shapes

grattan_save_pptx()

Save a ggplot2 chart, or list of charts, as a Powerpoint presentation

grattan_colour_manual() grattan_fill_manual()

Convenient functions to set Grattan-appropriate palettes

grattan_yellow

Hex code for the colour: Grattan yellow (butternut pumpkin soup)

grattan_yellow_f

Hex code for the faded colour: Grattan yellow (faded)

make_slide() make_presentation()

Create Powerpoint slides (deprecated)

replace_labs()

Replace a ggplot2's labels (title, subtitle, and/or caption) with a given string. Works for regular ggplot2 plots and patchwork plots.

save_chartdata()

Save a ggplot2 chart as a properly-formatted "chart data" Excel spreadsheet

stitch_pdfs()

Combine multiple PDFs into a single PDF

theme_grattan()

Create a ggplot2 theme consistent with the Grattan style guide.

watermark()

Add a watermark annotation layer for a ggplot2 object

wrap_labs()

Format title, subtitle, and caption of a ggplot2 chart in the Grattan style.
